amendment.description: Amendment restores the current requirement that the National Weather Service certify that there is no degradation of service before a Weather Service office is closed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 1 in the Congressional Record of October 10, 1995, to restore the current requirement that the National Weather Service certify that there is no degradation of service before a Weather Service office is closed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cramer amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
